boxes.label: of importance as an input to future research;
boxes.value: of importance as an input to future research;

boxes.label: relevant to research questions of interest to a variety of researchers;
boxes.value: relevant to research questions of interest to a variety of researchers;

boxes.label: accessible, for the purposes of research, subject to appropriate access rules;
boxes.value: accessible, for the purposes of research, subject to appropriate access rules;

boxes.label: discoverable through registration in discipline/domain registries, or generic registries such as Research Data Australia; and
boxes.value: discoverable through registration in discipline/domain registries, or generic registries such as Research Data Australia; and

boxes.label: an input to research supported by at least one participant organisation in the node.
boxes.value: an input to research supported by at least one participant organisation in the node.

validation-messages.MeritBChecked: Merit Information Section B must have at least one criterion met

boxes.label: observational data that is collected, curated and made available to third party researchers;
boxes.value: observational data that is collected, curated and made available to third party researchers;

boxes.label: generated data that is developed as an information product to underpin the research of third party researchers;
boxes.value: generated data that is developed as an information product to underpin the research of third party researchers;

boxes.label: aggregated data that is assembled by individuals or research communities in order to make research questions more addressable; and/or
boxes.value: aggregated data that is assembled by individuals or research communities in order to make research questions more addressable; and/or

boxes.label: a mirror of international collections that are held locally, for purposes of improved performance and reduced cost.
boxes.value: a mirror of international collections that are held locally, for purposes of improved performance and reduced cost.

boxes.label: relevant to a broad user base within or across disciplines and domains;
boxes.value: relevant to a broad user base within or across disciplines and domains;

boxes.label: readily accessible, with respect to connectivity and integration, recognising any constraints such as legal, licensing or ethical requirements;
boxes.value: readily accessible, with respect to connectivity and integration, recognising any constraints such as legal, licensing or ethical requirements;

boxes.label: in reusable forms, well described and documented, to support long-term access and management;
boxes.value: in reusable forms, well described and documented, to support long-term access and management;

boxes.label: citable through a mechanism such as a digital object identifier; and
boxes.value: citable through a mechanism such as a digital object identifier; and

boxes.label: of sufficiently high quality and fit for purpose, as indicated by domain-relevant measures such as completeness, coverage, and resolution.
boxes.value: of sufficiently high quality and fit for purpose, as indicated by domain-relevant measures such as completeness, coverage, and resolution.
